com.nexmo.client

Interface NexmoMessageEventListener


  • public interface NexmoMessageEventListener
    NexmoMessageEventListener dispatches a NexmoEvent related to a NexmoConversation.

    Available events on a NexmoMessageEventListener are:

    • onTextEvent(NexmoTextEvent)
    • onAttachmentEvent(NexmoAttachmentEvent)
    • onEventDeleted(NexmoDeletedEvent)
    • onSeenReceipt(NexmoSeenEvent)
    • onDeliveredReceipt(NexmoDeliveredEvent)
    • onTypingEvent(NexmoTypingEvent)

    Example usage:

         nexmoClient.newConversation(CONVERSATION_NAME, CONVERSATION_DISPLAY_NAME, new NexmoRequestListener<NexmoConversation>() {
         @Override
         public void onSuccess(NexmoConversation conversation) {
              // Update the application UI here if needed.
          conversation.addMessageEventListener(new NexmoMessageEventListener(){
         @Override
               void onTextEvent(NexmoTextEvent event){
                  Log.d("NexmoMessageEventListener:onTextEvent", "Got [" + event.getText() + "] from:" + event.getMember().getId());

               }
         @Override
               void onAttachmentEvent(NexmoAttachmentEvent event){
                  Log.d("NexmoMessageEventListener:onAttachmentEvent", "Got [" + event.getOriginal().getUrl() + "] from:" + event.getMember().getId());

               }
         @Override
               void onEventDeleted(NexmoDeletedEvent event){
                  Log.d("NexmoMessageEventListener:onEventDeleted", "Got [" + event.getInitialEvent().getId() + "] from:" + event.getMember().getId());

               }
         @Override
               void onSeenReceipt(NexmoSeenEvent event){
                  Log.d("NexmoMessageEventListener:onSeenReceipt", "Got [" + event.initialEvent() + "] from:" + event.getMember().getId());

               }
         @Override
               void onDeliveredReceipt(NexmoDeliveredEvent event){
                  Log.d("NexmoMessageEventListener:onDeliveredReceipt", "Got [" + event.initialEvent() + "] from:" + event.getMember().getId());

               }
         @Override
               void onTypingEvent(NexmoTypingEvent event){
                  Log.d("NexmoMessageEventListener:onTypingEvent", "Got [" + event.getState() + "] from:" + event.getMember().getId());

               }
         }
         @Override
         public void onError(NexmoAPIError error) {
              // Update the application UI here if needed.
         }
    });
